timeline.message:
Add delete autoscaling policy API

This commit adds an API for deleting autoscaling policies.
Fix name of delete autoscaling policy cluster state task

timeline.bodyText: I think the norm for Request toXContent is to not include fields that are not part of the REST body. For Instance, PutAutoscalingPolicyAction.Request.toXContent does not include the policy name. I tend to think this toXContent should generate an empty object or maybe the request should not implement toXContentObject?
timeline.author: henningandersen

timeline.message: Fix delete autoscaling policy request toXContent
